app_descript:
Walk with Map My Walk

Brief: Walk with Map My Walk is an engaging fitness tracking app that encourages a healthy lifestyle through an array of workouts, training plans, and community challenges. The app is designed to accommodate at-home fitness regimes as well as outdoor activities and connects seamlessly with various apps and wearables.
